item.description:
Raise bake sale awareness! Support bake sale black markets!

As you may know our brave bureaucrats in Massachusetts were seeking to ban bake sales from public school related activities in an effort to target childhood obesity. Never fear because our noble MA House legisl...ature later overturned the ban after widespread outrage. Thank you masters!

Still this is an indication of where the inclination of the MA legislature is, and likely the same bureaucrats will attempt to police what we eat in other ways, next time with more caution and stealth.

BAKE SALE DETAILS
So in an effort to show our support for bake sales and bakers everywhere, we are having a bake sale, or at least selling baked goods! DO NOT BRING FOOD, we will instead have order forms where we will be taking orders from liberty oriented baking & food companies and raising money for liberty groups.
item.name: Liberty Drinks Boston's Bake Sale Benefit for Bake Sales
